DataElement.preferredName: Child Hypersensitivity Personal Medical History Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law._A local or general reaction of an organism following contact with a specific allergen to which it has been previously exposed and to which it has become sensitized._an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law._A local or general reaction of an organism following contact with a specific allergen to which it has been previously exposed and to which it has become sensitized._an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.

Property.preferredDefinition: A local or general reaction of an organism following contact with a specific allergen to which it has been previously exposed and to which it has become sensitized.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: An immune response that occurs following exposure to an innocuous antigen, but that does not require the presence of preformed antibodies to the antigen.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ReferenceDocuments.name: This measure is a questionnai
ReferenceDocuments.description: This measure is a questionnaire to collect information on a participant's personal medical history of allergies.
